import Header from "../../components/Header" import Sidebar from "../../components/Sidebar" import Footer from "../../components/Footer" import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import React, {useState, useEffect} from "react"; import axios from "axios"; function AddCategory(){ const [data, setCategoriesData] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { getCategories(); }, []) const getCategories = async () =>{ const response = await axios.get("http://localhost:8090/api/categories"); if(response.status === 200){ setCategoriesData(response.data); } } console.log("data =>", data) return (
